abstract: Kenyon College men's swimming and diving teams hope to rekindle winning streak that netted them 31 consecutive national championships from 1980 to 2010.
snippet: Kenyon College won 31 consecutive men’s swimming and diving national championships from 1980 to 2010, so the goal this season is to start a new streak.
lead_paragraph: Kenyon College won 31 consecutive men’s swimming and diving national championships from 1980 to 2010, so the goal this season is to start a new streak.

headline.main: Missing in the Pool at Kenyon: A Title to Defend
headline.print_headline: Missing in the Pool at Kenyon: A Title to Defend
headline.seo: Missing at Kenyon College: A Swim Title to Defend
